title: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code One GitHub Action in Apache Arrow Rust involving docs has been failing since about 23 hours ago. ```bash cargo doc --document-private-items --no-deps --workspace --all-features ``` ### Meta I do not have access to the exact configs but this is what we have now `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (750bd1a7f 2022-09-14) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:345 ~ tower[3c23]::balance::pool::{impl#3}::build) (CanonicalUserTypeAnnotation { user_ty: Canonical { max_universe: U0, variables: [CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Ty(General(U0)) }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Ty(General(U0)) }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Ty(General(U0)) }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Ty(General(U0)) }], value: TypeOf(DefId(0:232 ~ tower[3c23]::balance::p2c::service::{impl#1}::new), UserSubsts { substs: [^0, ^1], user_self_ty: Some(UserSelfTy { impl_def_id: DefId(0:229 ~ tower[3c23]::balance::p2c::service::{impl#1}), self_ty: balance::p2c::service::Balance<^2, ^3> }) }) }, span: /usr/local/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/tower-0.4.13/src/balance/pool/mod.rs:293:22: 293:34 (#0), inferred_ty: fn(std::pin::Pin>>) -> balance::p2c::service::Balance>>, Request> {balance::p2c::service::Balance::>>, Request>::new} }): bad user type AscribeUserType(fn(std::pin::Pin>>) -> balance::p2c::service::Balance>>, Request> {balance::p2c::service::Balance::>>, Request>::new}, DefId(0:232 ~ tower[3c23]::balance::p2c::service::{impl#1}::new) UserSubsts { substs: [_, _], user_self_ty: Some(UserSelfTy { impl_def_id: DefId(0:229 ~ tower[3c23]::balance::p2c::service::{impl#1}), self_ty: balance::p2c::service::Balance<_, _> }) }, type_of=fn(D) -> balance::p2c::service::Balance {balance::p2c::service::Balance::::new}): NoSolution | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/type_check/mod.rs:1087:25 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1492:13 ```
Backtrace

``` 0: 0x7f6cc5f6ec20 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::hf9cd4c385c25a2fe at /rustc/750bd1a7ff3e010611b97ee75d30b7cbf5f3a03c/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 1: 0x7f6cc5f6ec20 -
